amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provision stating that an action involving a covered energy decision shall take precedence over all other pending matters before the district court.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in House Report 113-493 to strike the provision that an action involving a covered energy decision shall take precedence over all other pending matters before the district court.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 223 (Roll no. 363).
